raw_body: CHRISTIE ALWIS – “At Rest with Jesus” (Former Director of Sri Lanka Telecom),​ beloved husband of Vinodini Alwis,​ father of Shanika Alwis (Daughter-Germany),​ Nilushika Alwis (Daughter-Australia),​ Jayanika Fernandopulle (Daughter – UK),​ Shaveen Alwis (Son),​ father-in-law of Kort Bremer (Son-in-law – Germany),​ Dhammike Amarasinghe (Son-in-law – Australia),​ Ashan Fernandopulle (Son-in-law – UK),​ grandfather of Ava Marie Amarasinghe & Rafael Fernandopulle,​ brother of Rev. Br. Sunanda Alwis (Principal – Maris Stella College,​ Negombo),​ Lal Alwis (Ex Airtel) and Rita Alwis,​ passed away on the 01st of September 2023. Remains will lie at 2/​1,​ Ninion Mawatha,​ off Ave Maria Road,​ Negombo. Funeral arrangements will be notified later.055356
